thread.title: Benioff grades himself 'between A and D' on diversity, calls out Apple, Amazon and others
thread.title_full: Benioff grades himself 'between A and D' on diversity, calls out Apple, Amazon and others

title: Benioff grades himself 'between A and D' on diversity, calls out Apple, Amazon and others
text: September 17, 2015 at 17:25 PM EDT Benioff grades himself 'between A and D' on diversity, calls out Apple, Amazon and others "I'm not going to give myself a D, because isn't this amazing?" exclaimed Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff, to great applause from the crowd...
